title: Handle Free Trial to Paid Subscription Conversion
description: A user's free trial is about to end, and the system needs to automatically convert them to a paid subscription.

tasks.description: Identify all users whose free trials are ending today.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a list of users to be converted.

tasks.description: For each user, charge their registered payment method for the first month of service.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent processes the payments. Some succeed, some fail.

tasks.description: Update the account status to 'Active Subscriber' for successful payments, and 'On Hold' for failed payments.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly updates the status for all users in the list.
